author: Juliette Lawrence Wilson
method: Pop all the ingredients into a blender and pulse until it has a consistency that you desire. Plenty of pepper is good but go easy on the salt, as the smoked salmon will be salty already. Occasionally I would substitute lime and coriander instead of lemon and chives.
ingredients: 255g/9oz smoked salmon ,  110g/4oz cream cheese,  2 tbsp double cream,  ½  lemon, juice only,  2 tbsp chopped chives (plus some extra chives to sprinkle over the top),  pinch of sugar,  salt and freshly ground pepper
